title: COVID-19 Infection and Hospitalization Prediction Modeling: Gender Difference Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical knowledge and understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in developing predictive models considering gender differences in smartphone-based microlearning environments

learning_goals: Three or more gender-based COVID-19 infection risk factors can be identified
A gender classification prediction system can be built using a Gradient Boosting machine learning model
The impact of socioeconomic factors and biomarkers on infection rates can be comparatively analyzed by gender
The relative importance of age and metabolism-related variables in a hospitalization risk prediction model can be evaluated

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
